Text:
Works perfectly (bit stuttery windowed mode for some reason).  It's got local co-op too!

Thanks!
Torrent works for me but I was unable to get the resolution to go higher than 1280x1024 in the options menu. Anyone know if this is a limitation of the game or a mistake in the crack?

setup.exe (736kb) have virus

right click on setup.exe (736kb)
select 7-zip>extract
get really setup.exe (1.07mb)
delete abode.exe < virus
Doesn't work for me.. i use win7 x64 8800gt and besides the resolution can't go above 1280x1024, the graphics are messed up, almost nothing can be seen properly.
Ok, i found a solution for messed up graphics - turn off antialiasing in Nvidia control panel... but still, fix the resolution issue SKIDROW! i'm sure it can go 1920x1080

only thing skidrow did is putting steam emulator.

problems so far:
resets user configuration, limited resolution support, no key remapping.
also game is not that good.

shame on square enix.
